required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase 1 Dose Escalation and Expansion Study Of SHR-1916 In Subjects With Locally Advanced Or Metastatic Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-Label, Multicenter, Dose Escalation And Expansion Study Of SHR-1916 In Subjects With Locally Advanced Or Metastatic Solid Tumor Malignancies

brief_summary.textblock: This is a first in human, open-label, dose escalation and expansion Phase 1 study of SHR-1916 in adult patients with locally advanced or metastatic solid tumors.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration time curve in the dosing interval AUC(TAU) of SHR-1916
Maximum observed plasma concentration (Cmax) of SHR-1916
Minimum observed plasma concentration (Cmin) of SHR-1916
Time of maximum observed plasma concentration (Tmax) of SHR-1916
Percentage of NK cell and CD8+ T cell by flow cytometry
Absolute count values of NK cell and CD8+ T cell by flow cytometry
Immunogenicity analysis to assess anti-drug antibodies (ADA) to SHR-1916 in human serum

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the time point of every 9 weeks
at the time point of every 9 weeks

clinical_study.condition: Unspecified Adult Solid Tumor, Protocol Specific
